2096140.name: KeepUp Survival -  Zombie Expansion (beta)
2096140.description:
Note: This DLC is currently in the Beta phase and is not a development priority. Bugs, errors, and other issues may still occur.

This DLC package includes:
A free, experimental zombie expansion.
The zombies are known as “Guardians.”

This expansion was designed as an optional feature to offer players an alternative challenge, not to permanently steer the game in a traditional “zombie” direction.

  • In Zombie Mode, the number of animals is reduced, making survival more difficult, while the threat from zombies increases.

  • To activate the mode, create a new session and select Zombie Mode.

  • Zombies can also be kept as pets.

Development Status:
This DLC is being developed with low priority.
If interest remains low or if the feedback and ratings become mostly negative, this DLC may be discontinued or replaced with other content in the future.

Feedback and ideas can always be shared in the CommunityHUB, allowing players to help decide whether and how the mode will continue to evolve.
2096140.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语, 波兰语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 法语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 瑞典语, 土耳其语, 丹麦语, 荷兰语, 芬兰语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
